title: Revolver
summaries: The Revolver is a gun purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 10 after a Shadow Orb or Crimson Heart has been smashed. Statistically, it is a direct upgrade to The Undertaker. It can also be considered an indirect upgrade to the Red Ryder, though the Red Ryder does have autoswing while the Revolver does not.

In the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, the Traveling Merchant also uses it to defend himself, but will switch to a Pulse Bow once the world is in Hardmode.
The Revolver has a base 9% critical strike chance, as opposed to the usual 4%.
